name: MadChad
description: MadChad is a MMORPG game (the most profitable segment of gaming industry) on which everything becomes NFTS. It is a combination of power and hability that will bring you to the top of the raking, get some money and transform you in MADCHAD! You will be able to gather friends, groups and guilds and battle in some different arenas, maps and islands, facing the challenges within the game. The ecosystem was designed to be attractive to investors and gamers as well as to give traction to the token. Staking plataform presents a hybrid concept – innovative – on which investors staking their tokens and get rewards in BNB – first come first serve basis. In this way, investors are not exposed to impermanent loss. On the other hand, gamers can buy NFTs and in game accessories using multiple coins. But token utility is preserved as – to start playing – users need to buy the first NFTs with MadChad token. PLAY AND EARN! NFT MARKETPLACE! STAKING REWARDS IN BNB!
